content: lion brand pattern # 70210a skill level level 3 - intermediate finished bust 32 36 44 48 in 81 5 91 5 112 122 cm sweater will stretch to fit a wide range of sizes finished length 35 37-1/2 39-1/2 41 in 89 95 5 100 5 104 cm wool-ease® article #620 7 8 10 12 balls *shown in avocado* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers large-eye blunt point needle pieces worked flat body incorporates front back armholes cowl neck worked in the round sleeves 2 top is worked in half_double_crochet u s work all stitches through back loop only of stitches of previous row sweater body is crocheted vertically in one piece from right front side edge to right back side edge sleeves are picked up around armhole and worked down towards wrist construction schematics are provided
